headline: RFID Market Analysis Report 2026 - Global Forecast to 2034 with Zebra Technologies, Honeywell International, Avery Dennison, HID Global, and Datalogic Dominating
summary: The RFID market is estimated to grow from USD 14.58 billion in 2025 to USD 30.47 billion by 2034, at a CAGR of 8.5%. This growth is driven by rising demand for real-time tracking and data accuracy across retail, logistics, manufacturing, and healthcare. The contactless payments segment will register the highest CAGR, fueled by the demand for quick, secure transactions. RFID labels will lead in market share by 2034, with Asia Pacific showing the highest regional CAGR. Key players include Zebra Te

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Avery Dennison (AVY) After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether Avery Dennison shares still offer value at around US$195.80, it helps to step back and look at what the current price might be implying about the company. The stock has posted returns of 3.3% over the last 7 days, 3.8% over 30 days, 7.3% year to date and 10.1% over 1 year, with a 3 year return of 13.3% and 5 year return of 23.5%. This gives investors some context for how the share price has behaved recently. Recent company news has kept Avery Dennison on...

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Approach with Caution
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
